question: I am 24 and I was diagnosed with juvenile diabetes this year. Within the past few days I have been having some really bad stomach pain and knee pain. I have never had these pains before. Every morning when I wake up my knees are achy. My stomach is sore all day. I have an appt with my doctor but it won't be for some time. If anyone has any ideas, please let me know. I will run all possibilities by my doctor.
title: Diabetes and Stomach/Knee pain
